title: 一題英文閱讀測驗
content:
The majority of Indian women wear a red dot between their eyebrows. While it is generally taken as an indicator of their marital status, the practice is primarily related to the Hindu religion.


Why did people in India start wearing a red dot on their forehead?
(A) To indicate their social rank. (B) To show their religious belief.
(C) To display their financial status. (D) To highlight their family background.

這題下好離手  不歡迎某個愛用英文馬後砲的人來鬧(JX XP)
